title: Lakshmi Kasu Mala Pendant - Divine Emerald and Diamond Adornment
features: This exquisite pendant showcases the goddess Lakshmi seated atop a lotus, flanked by meticulously crafted peacocks. Intricate diamond-studded filigree work accentuates the detailing of the goddess and peacocks. A central oval-cut emerald provides a vibrant contrast. The pendant is further embellished with dangling, diamond-studded spherical elements, adding a playful yet elegant touch. Nakshi work is evident in the detailing of Lakshmi's form and attire.
colors: Primarily gold with shimmering diamond accents
occasions: Ideal for traditional South Indian weddings (Muhurtham)
and family gatherings. Also suitable for upscale modern events
adding a touch of cultural elegance to any outfit.
description: This Lakshmi Kasu Mala Pendant is a symbol of prosperity, fortune, and grace. The high-quality gemstones and expert craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and durability. The blend of traditional design with modern diamond accents makes it a timeless piece. Owning this pendant is not just about adorning yourself with beautiful jewelry, but also embracing the rich cultural heritage of South India.
